room_title: Escape room "INNOCENT!" by River City Escape Room in Richmond (VA)
room_description: The River City is shaken by two ghastly murders….You were just passing through town, having a few drinks at the local bar and someone picks a fight. No big deal, but this time is different. You’re in custody, accused of those murders! You’re booked into the local jail when the police are called away. You have an hour to prove your innocence and escape before it's too late!
